TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormShowConstants extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 方法相容的常數。

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0`Modal`參數`Show`方法用來判斷表單是否會顯示為強制回應對話方塊。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `Modal` parameter of the `Show` method was used to determine whether a form would be shown as a modal dialog box. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`Modal`由兩個不同的顯示方法的參數會被取代：和。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `Modal` parameter is replaced by two different Show methods: and . 這些常數可啟用從 Visual Basic 6.0，才能繼續執行而不需額外修改已升級的程式碼。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FormShowConstants Modal = int32(1)

summary.span: 相當於 Visual Basic 6.0 常數 。

span.span: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FormShowConstants Modeless = int32(0)
